scripts.theme: cd theme && theme open && theme deploy && theme watch
scripts.start: webpack --mode development & cd theme && theme open && theme deploy && theme watch
scripts.watch: webpack --mode development & cd theme && theme open && theme watch
scripts.build: webpack && cd theme && theme open && theme deploy
scripts.deploy: webpack && cd theme && theme open --env=production && theme deploy --env=production --allow-live
scripts.deploy_safe: webpack && cd theme && theme open --env=production && theme deploy --env=production -n
scripts.download: cd theme && theme open && theme download
scripts.start_staging: webpack --mode development & cd theme && theme open --env=staging && theme deploy --env=staging && theme watch --env=staging
scripts.watch_staging: webpack --mode development & cd theme && theme open --env=staging && theme watch --env=staging
